original_text: And Jacob beheld the countenance of Laban, and, behold, it was not toward him as before.
korean_text: 야곱이 라반의 안색을 본즉 자기에게 대하여 전과 같지 아니하더라

sentences.original_text: And Jacob beheld the countenance of Laban
and, behold, it was not toward him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 보라, 그는 그를 향하지 않았고
